scripts.build:client: yarn --cwd client && yarn --cwd client build && mkdir -p server/static/shell && cp -r client/dist/* server/static/shell/
scripts.build:shared: yarn --cwd shared && yarn --cwd shared build && rm -rf server/static/shared/*  && cp -r shared/dist/* server/static/shared/
scripts.build:vendor: mkdir -p server/static/shared/node_modules &&  yarn --cwd vendor && cp -r vendor/node_modules server/static/shared
scripts.build: mkdir -p server/static/shared/node_modules  server/temp && yarn build:client && yarn build:shared && yarn build:vendor
scripts.dev: yarn && yarn build && nodemon -r dotenv/config server/src/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env.dev
scripts.docker: yarn && yarn build && forever -c 'node -r dotenv/config' server/src/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env
